comment.author: 43854658@N00
comment._content: I never knew there was such a thing as egg sanding!  Add that to a very long list of things I never knew ... including prune washers, and I'm thankful to OSU for their assist with my continuing education. ;) Could the "Mr. (Jack/John) St. Johns of Gervais, Oregon" in this photo be the same John L. St John (1925-2011) of Gervais, Oregon who graduated from Oregon State College, Class of 1950 with a Bachelor of Science, Major in Poultry Husbandry? The later photo looks as if it could be him. If so, he had an outstanding list of accomplishments after graduation!

comment.author: 34586311@N05
comment._content:
We take our poultry presentation seriously here in Oregon!

As for the busy sander -- too bad we can't get a side profile of Mr. St Johns.
